full_summary:
### Land Command Support System Engineering and Management Service

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issued a Request For Proposal (RFP) for a service contract to support the engineering and management of the Land Command Support System (LCSS), a system used by the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) serving both domestically and internationally.

#### Contract Overview
The PSPC is seeking a professional services contract to provide support for the maintenance, upgrade, and improvement of the LCSS. The contract period is expected to be 3 years, with the possibility of three 1-year irrevocable options to extend the term.

#### Key Contract Details

* __Procurement Method:__ The procurement method is Competitive-Selective Tendering
* __Selection Criteria:__ The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* __Trade Agreements:__ The contract is subject to several trade agreements, including CETA, CPTPP, and WTO GPA
* __Regions of Delivery:__ The contract will be delivered within the National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Tender Information
* __Tender Closing Date:__ The tender closing date is set for October 24th, 2022 at 14:00 PM EDT
* __Amendment Number:__ The current amendment number is 4
* __Notice URL:__ The notice can be found on http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14062862?extsite=MTQwNjI4NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
